```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data(rest_inspec)
rest_inspec = rest_inspec %>% 
  rename(rest_name = dba, id = camis) %>% 
  select(action, boro, id, critical_flag, cuisine_description,
         rest_name, inspection_type, score, grade, grade_date, zipcode) %>%
  filter(!is.na(grade)) %>% 
  sample_n(5000)
```
